Will these measures be good for AMC shareholders in the long term The truth is nobody knows Paying down debt is a good move for AMC but the balance sheet is still pretty bloated Well have to wait and see what management does with these new equity infusions

The company had 1019 billion in total debt at the end of Q3 to 92 billion in assets One of managements main goals over the last couple of years has been utilizing the high stock price to reduce debt and stabilize the companys financial situation

But the bad news If APE units are converted to AMC shares AMC just gave Antara a massive discount AMC sold the APE units for 066 meaning Antara has already doubled their money in just one day and could get AMC shares worth 462 if the conversion happens

AMC also reduced debt by allowing Antara Capital to convert 100 million of debt into APE units AMC said in a statement that this will save the company about 10 million in annual interest expenses through 2026
This 110m raise isnt the only new capital coming in AMC has added 272 million in new cash to the balance sheet over the last 90 days through the sale of equity
CEO Adam Aron thinks so

That new equity can be used to reduce debt and get the company into a better financial situation The question shareholders need to ask is Will that 110 million be put to work to improve the value of AMC longterm

Now lets get back to the new equity raise AMC raised 110 million of new equity through the sale of APE units to Antara Capital LP at a price of 066 per share While this dilutes shareholders there is good news
While this has no material impact on the companys financials a reverse split is typically a sign that management wants the stock price to appear higher than it is now

And what about the potential reverse split While a reverse split isnt bad on its own it could signal that AMC management believes shares could be heading lower The 10for1 reverse split would turn 10 shares trading for 458 each into 1 share trading for 4580

But the potential conversion of APE units into AMC stock sent the price of APE through the roof This is because APE units have been trading at a discount but the possibility of conversion into AMC shares means the discount should start to close

Why The main reason for AMCs drop is dilution Any sale of new shares is bad for existing shareholders as their positions are diluted by new shareholders AMC shareholders will be diluted by new APE units being sold
